ai-patthana15.12:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.12:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.12:3.1_0: Though the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or reason for the sake of limitless teaching.
ai-patthana15.12:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
